existing_features.title: In the Dashboard > Subject Analysis tab, update the Backlog Distribution panel so that each displayed roll number is clickable and selecting it opens the full Student Data Sheet for that student (using the same behavior as selecting a roll number from the Subject Analysis failed-students dropdown).

Add a callback interface between SemesterDashboardView and BacklogDistributionPanel (e.g., an onRollNumberSelect prop) so the Backlog Distribution panel can notify the dashboard of the clicked roll number without duplicating Student Data Sheet rendering logic inside BacklogDistributionPanel.

new_feature_requests.summary: Apply the same student roll-number click behavior to the backlog distribution view so clicking a roll number opens the student's complete data sheet.
